text: William Ernest Eiffler (4 November 1925 – 2 June 2014) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1925 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Western Australia Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Subiaco Football Club players
title: Ernie Eiffler
